hero.title: Welcome to Taste&Toast
hero.subtitle: Experience culinary excellence in a warm and inviting atmosphere. Our chef-crafted menu features fresh, locally-sourced ingredients prepared with passion and creativity.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Founded in 2010, our restaurant has been serving the community with delicious, thoughtfully prepared meals for over a decade. We believe in the power of good food to bring people together and create lasting memories.

localIngredients.title: Locally Sourced Ingredients
localIngredients.description: We partner with local farmers and suppliers to bring you the freshest, highest-quality ingredients in every dish.

culinaryExcellence.title: Culinary Excellence
culinaryExcellence.description: Our team of skilled chefs combines traditional techniques with innovative flavors to create unforgettable dining experiences.

customerExperience.title: Customer Experience
customerExperience.description: Our goal is to provide exceptional service and create a warm, welcoming atmosphere where you can relax and enjoy your meal.

communityInvolvement.title: Community Involvement
communityInvolvement.description: We are committed to supporting local charities and organizations that make a positive impact in our community.

teamMembers.name: Emily Chen
teamMembers.description: With over 15 years of experience, Emily brings innovative flavors to our menu.

teamMembers.name: Michael Rodriguez
teamMembers.description: Michael's passion for local ingredients shines through in every dish he creates.

teamMembers.name: Sarah Johnson
teamMembers.description: Sarah's exquisite desserts are the perfect sweet ending to any meal.

teamMembers.name: David Lee
teamMembers.description: David's expertise ensures the perfect wine pairing for your dining experience.
